points.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
points.quoteText:
Justin René Back "Pixelcat Productions" uses the collected data for various purposes:

  • To provide and maintain the Service
  • To notify you about changes to our Service
  • To allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service when you choose to do so
  • To provide customer care and support
  • To provide analysis or valuable information so that we can improve the Service
  • To monitor the usage of the Service
  • To detect, prevent and address technical issues

points.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
points.quoteText:
We honor your privacy and therefore recommend choosing a pseudonym.
Of course, you are free to choose your real name, nobody stops you from this.</

points.title: This service provides a way for you to export your data
points.status:
10. Your Data

Justin René Back "Pixelcat Productions" respects your data and offers you tools to download and delete your data via E-Mail, Support Ticket or Interface tools.
points.quoteText: Justin René Back "Pixelcat Productions" respects your data and offers you tools to download and delete your data via E-Mail, Support Ticket or Interface tools.

points.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
points.quoteText:
Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

  • Email address
  • First name and last name
  • Cookies and Usage Data
Usage

points.title: This service provides a way for you to export your data
points.quoteText:
In certain circumstances, you have the following data protection rights:

  • The right to access, update or to delete the information we have on you

points.title: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent
points.quoteText: third parties only have access to the data you approve by "authorizing" (approving) apps

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
points.quoteText: If you wish to be informed what Personal Information we hold about you and if you want it to be removed from our systems, please contact us

points.title: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason
points.quoteText: The company reserves the right to change, redact, and delete content on the forum for any reason.

points.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
points.quoteText:
Pixelcat Productions may revise these Terms of Use for its Website at any time with prior notice.
Pixelcat Productions notifies you either via E-Mail or Account Alert upon updating our Terms Of Use or Privacy Policy.
By using this Website, you are agreeing to be bound by the current version of these Terms and Conditions of Use.</

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
points.quoteText: Any claim related to Pixelcat Productions's Website shall be governed by the laws of de without regards to its conflict of law provisions

points.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
points.quoteText: We take DMCA Takedowns seriously and if you see any copyright infringing content, contact us immediately

points.title: The service gives 30 days of notice before closing your account
points.quoteText: Pixelcat Productions will notify you 1 month in advance for any Terms Of Service infringtion and will issue warnings before your final suspension

points.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
points.quoteText: This will let Pixelcat Productions to terminate upon violations of any of these restrictions. Upon termination, your viewing right will also be terminated and you should destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether it is printed or electronic format.

points.title: You maintain ownership of your data
points.quoteText: Any content you upload is yours and must be yours.

points.title: This service does not sell your personal data
points.quoteText:
Your data is never sold anywhere NEVER.
Our Service is completely ad free and runs on either donations, or other income sources such as software sales

points.title: This service does not track you
points.quoteText: We don't use any third party tracking software such as Google Adsense or any other software

points.title: The service does not use third-party analytics or tracking platforms
points.quoteText: We do not have any "data-share-partnerships" with other companies, thus we only have the info you gave us.<

points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
points.quoteText:
The following list contains a complete set on what data we collect on you

  • Your IP Address (For logging purposes, see above and your login history)
  • An ID (numeric) generated for your account
  • The username you entered upon registering
  • The password (hashed with a salt) you entered upon registering
  • The firstname you have entered upon registering
  • The lastname you have entered upon registering
  • The email address you have entered upon registering
  • An account flag if you have been suspended or not
  • An account flag if you are an employee of Pixelcat Productions or not
  • An account flag if you have 2fa enabled or not
  • Your 2fa secret
  • An unix timestamp of the time when you have activated TFA
  • A history of all your login sessions (session token, remember token, IP, Device, If Session is valid, Last Login, Session Creation Time)
  • A support token for easier communication with our support
  • The language you set
  • External Provider ID (If registered with an external provider)
  • An account flag if you have registered with an external provider or not
  • Forum Account ID (If registered at our forums)
  • An account flag if you have an account at our forums or not
  • An account flag if you have enabled your authorization timer
  • A livechat token for easier communication with our support
  • Your uploaded picture to our CDN, stored as an URL. Or by default: Gravatar avatars

points.title: This service provides a way for you to export your data
points.quoteText:
e respect your data and provide tools ready for you at our interface to delete and/or download them.
The exported archives are stored on our servers for 48 hours and then permanently deleted.
You can request an archive once every 30 days but not because we dont like privacy, but rather want to save bandwith, storage and processing power as the service we offer, is completely free.

points.title: Your personal data is given to third parties
points.quoteText:
We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service ("Service Providers"), to provide the Service on our behalf, to perform Service-related services or to assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.

These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
points.quoteText: Your data is yours, and you have the right to leave our service at any time.

points.title: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent
points.quoteText:
Third party companies can create so called "OAuth Applications", they gain access to the data only if you authorize those to.
We provide a detailed list of what "scopes" (Permissions) can do to your account and affect your privacy

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
points.quoteText: Furthermore, Pixelcat Productions does not make any representations concerning the accuracy or reliability of the use of the materials on its Website or otherwise relating to such materials or any sites linked to this Website.

points.title: The policy refers to documents that are missing or unfindable
points.status: "Privacy Policy Links" is not a hyperlink
points.quoteText: You may find a complete list of these Privacy Policies and their links here: Privacy Policy Links.

points.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
points.status: The terms of use do not prohibit the use of pseudonyms and even offers the ability to choose a username upon registering.
points.quoteText:
We honor your privacy and therefore recommend choosing a pseudonym.
Of course, you are free to choose your real name, nobody stops you from this.</

points.title: You waive your right to a class action.
points.quoteText: You will settle any dispute as an individual, and not as part of a class action or other representative proceeding, whether as the plaintiff or a class member.

points.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
points.quoteText: Other than to seek an injunction or for claims under the Computer Fraud and Abuse Act, you and the company will resolve any Dispute by binding American Arbitration Association arbitration.

points.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information
points.quoteText:
JBAuth's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites.
Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information.

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
points.quoteText: Pixelcat Productions or its suppliers will not be hold accountable for any damages that will arise with the use or inability to use the materials on Pixelcat Productions’s Website, even if Pixelcat Productions or an authorize representative of this Website has been notified, orally or written, of the possibility of such damage.

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
points.quoteText:
All the materials on Pixelcat Productions’s Website are provided "as is".
Pixelcat Productions makes no warranties, may it be expressed or implied, therefore negates all other warranties.

points.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
points.status: The web interface provides a way to export your data and view your previous exports as well.
